description: This file defines a 'SearchBar' UI component using the LightningJS framework. The component provides a simple search input emulation with preset parameters cycling on Enter key press and displays instructions. It interacts with external state management by dispatching the 'setQuery' action.

classes.name: SearchBar
classes.description: A LightningJS component that emulates a simple search bar with preset query cycling for TV remote control.

methods.name: commit
methods.description: Dispatches the current query to the external state via setQuery() method.
